en: What traditional dishes do you prepare during major celebrations?
sh: Man tirmt ad tsujadt ɣ laɛyad mqqurnin ?

en: What are the most commonly used musical instruments in your region?
sh: Mad gan alat n lmusiqa lli bahra ittustɛmaln ɣ tamazirt nnk ?

en: Could you tell me a proverb in Tachelhit and explain its meaning?
sh: Is tufit ad iyi tbdrt kra n lmaqula s tclḥit d ad iyi tcrḥrt lmɛna nns ?

en: Can you describe a traditional costume worn during celebrations?
sh: Is tufit ad iyi tuṣft kra n lksut tabldit lli lssan mddn ɣ lficṭat ?

en: How is traditional bread prepared?
sh: Manik a s ar nssnwa aɣrum abldi ?

en: Which herbs are used to treat illnesses?
sh: Man lɛcub ad n stɛmal bac ad nsjji timuḍan ?

en: Can you describe a traditional song that everyone knows?
sh: Is tufit ad iyi tuṣft kra n luɣnya tabldit lli kullu ssnn mddn ?

en: Can you describe the differences between life in the city and in the countryside?
sh: Is tufit ad iyi tuṣft lfrq gr lmɛict n lmdint d tin tmazirt ?

en: What is the relationship between people and their domestic animals?
sh: Mad igan lɛalaqa gr mddn d lḥayawanat n tgmmi ?

en: What do you like to do when you have free time?
sh: Mad dark iɛzzan ad tskart iɣ dark txwa luqt ?

en: What is the first thing you do in the morning?
sh: Mad tga lḥajt izwarn lli tskart zik sbaḥ ?

en: What do you like to eat when you’re in a good mood?
sh: Mad dark iɛzzan ad tcttat iɣ k iɛjb lḥal ?

en: What annoys you the most in daily life?
sh: Mad k bahra isɛṣṣabn ɣ tudrt nnk n kay gat ass ?

en: What do you do when you can’t sleep?
sh: Mad tskart iɣ k ur yiwi yiḍṣ ?

en: What do you think is the most important thing to pass on to children?
sh: Mad tga lḥajt lli bahra dark istawhmman is ixssa a s tnzzri i tarwa ?

en: What makes the Chleuh people special or different from others?
sh: Mad ittajan iclḥiyn tmyzn nɣ d xtalfn f wiyyad ?

en: How do young people spend their free time in your village or city?
sh: Manik a s ar zzrayn ccabab luqt lli darsn ixwan ɣ tmazirt nnk nɣ d lmdint nnk ?

en: How do you prepare mint tea?
sh: Manik a s ar nn tggat atay n nnɛnaɛ ?

en: Can you talk about the differences between religious celebrations in the city and in the countryside?
sh: Tẓḍaṛt ad tsawlt f lfrq lli illan gr lḥafalat ddinya ɣ lmdint d tmazirt ?

en: How do young people see the future of the Tachelhit language?
sh: Manik a s ar smuqquln ccabab lmustaqbal n tclḥit ?

en: What are the main challenges that people in your city or village face today?
sh: Mad gan imukrisn mqqurnin lli s ar ttɛanayn middn n lmdint nnk nɣ d tamazirt nnk ɣ ass ad ?

en: How do you think technologies in Tachelhit could help the Chleuh people in their lives?
sh: Manik a s ar ak ttbayan rad tɛawn ttiknulujya n tclḥit iclḥiyn ɣ tudrt nnsn ?

en: What is something you’ve learned recently that made you think deeply?
sh: Mad tga taɣawsa lli tɛllmt mu'xaran lli k yujjan ad tswingmt

en: How do you think young people can help improve their region?
sh: Manik a s ar ak ittbayan ẓḍaṛn ccabab ad sis ɛawenn bac ad ṭuwwṛn ljiha nnsn ?

en: In your opinion, what are the advantages that smartphones have brought to our lives?
sh: Ɣ ṛṛa'i nnk, mad gan tiɣawsiwin fulkinin lli d iwin smatphones s tudrt nnɣ ?

en: What was your favorite subject at school, and why?
sh: Mad yadlli tga lmadda lli kullu dark iɛzzan ɣ lmdrasa, d maxx ?

en: What is your dream job, and why?
sh: Mad tga lxdmt lli s bdda ttwargat, d maxx ?

en: What do you do to stay fit and healthy?
sh: Mad tskart bac ad sti tawit ɣ lforma nnk d ṣṣaḥt nnk ?

en: Can you describe your favorite place in your region and why you love it?
sh: Tẓḍaṛt ad iyi tuṣft lblast lli k bahra ittɛjabn ɣ ljiha nnk d max alliɣ tt tḥmlt ?

en: Can you talk about the most important thing your parents taught you?
sh: Tẓḍaṛt ad iyi tsawlt f tɣawsa lli kullu ihmman lli ak mlan ayt dark ?

en: What are the values you respect the most in your community?
sh: Mad gant lqiyyam lli bahra ttḥtaramt ɣ ayt tmazirt nnk ?

en: What is the one thing you would like the whole world to know about the Chleuh people?
sh: Mad tga lḥajt lli trit ad issn lɛalam kullu t f iclḥiyn ?

en: Can you describe how your village or city has changed in recent years?
sh: Tẓḍaṛt ad tuṣft manik s tbadl tamazirt nnk nɣ d lmdint nnk ɣ isggʷasn ad ggʷranin ?

en: If you won a lot of money, what would you do?
sh: Iɣ trbḥt agudi n lflus, mad rad tskrt ?

en: What do you like to do when you are alone?
sh: Mad ttirit ad tskart iɣ tgit waḥdu k ?

en: What is your favorite dish, and how do you prepare it?
sh: Man tirmt ad dark iɛzzan d manmk a s ar tt tɛdalt ?

en: If you could travel anywhere, where would you go and why?
sh: Iɣ tufit ad tsafart, mani s trit ad tddut d maxx ?

en: What always makes you laugh?
sh: Mad k bdda issḍṣan ?

en: If you could change just one thing in the world, what would it be?
sh: Iɣ tẓḍaṛt ad tsbadlt kra ɣ ddunit ad, mad rad tg ?

en: If you had to give advice to a 15-year-old, what would you tell them?
sh: Iɣ ixssa ad tfkt kra n nnaṣiḥa i kra n wazzan n 15 n usggʷas, mad rad as tinit ?

en: Can you tell me about a dream you had that you found strange?
sh: Is tẓḍaṛt ad iyi tɛawdt kra n twargit lli tskrt tg ak d lɛjb ?

en: What would you do if you could go back in time for one day?
sh: Mad rad tskrt iɣ tẓḍaṛt ad tssurrit luqt kra n wass ?

en: What is the most beautiful lesson life has taught you so far?
sh: Mad iga ddaṛṣ lli kullu ifulkin ad ak tmla tudrt ar ɣid ?

en: If Tachelhit disappeared tomorrow, how would you feel?
sh: Iɣ laḥḥ taclḥit askka, mad s rad tḥussut ?

en: Which song always makes you feel sad, and why?
sh: Man lmusiqa ad k bdda isqllaqn d max ?

en: How do you see the future of your region in twenty years?
sh: Mannik a s ar ak ittbayan lmustaqbal n ljiha nnk ɣid s yat 20 usggʷas ?

en: If you could change one habit among the Chleuh people, which one would you choose?
sh: Iɣ tufit ad tsbadlt kra n lɛada ɣ iclḥiyn, mad rad tg ?

en: If you had the chance to teach something to everyone, what would you choose?
sh: Iɣ tufit bac ad tsɛlmt kra n tɣawsa i lɛalam kullu t, mad rad tg ?

en: What do you think about the fact that many young people no longer speak Tachelhit well?
sh: Mad ak ibayn ɣ kigan n ccabab lli ur sul ssnn ad sawaln taclḥit mzyan ?

en: How do you imagine life without the Internet?
sh: Manik a s ar tzrrat tudrt bla lantirnit ?

en: What do you think of people who forget their traditions?
sh: Mad ak ittbayann ɣ mddn lli itettun lɛadat nnsn ?

en: If you could speak to the government, what would you say to help your region?
sh: Iɣ tufit ad tsawlt s lḥukuma, mad rad asn tinit bac ad tɛawnt ljiha nnk ?

en: If you had to choose between living by the sea or in the mountains, which would you choose and why?
sh: Iɣ d yiwi rbbi rad tstit gr ad tɛict ɣ tama n lbḥṛ nɣ d ɣ udrar, mad rad tstit d maxx ?

en: What do you think of movies or series in Tachelhit?
sh: Mad ak ittbayann ɣ laflam d lmusalsalat n tclḥit ?

en: If you could learn something from the elders, what would you want to learn?
sh: Iɣ tẓḍaṛt ad tɛllmt kra zɣ iqqdimn, mad rad tirit ad tɛllmt ?

en: Do you think Tachelhit should be taught in schools, and why?
sh: Is ak ibayn is ixṣṣa ad sɣrn tclḥit ɣ lmdrasa, d maxx ?

en: If you could meet a famous person, who would you choose?
sh: Iɣ rad tmiqqirt kra n yan ittussann, matta wad a rad tstit ?

en: What do you think of customs that people keep without really understanding them?
sh: Mad ak ittbayann ɣ lɛadat lli nttajja bla tnt nit nfhm ?

en: What do you think about those who go live abroad?
sh: Mad ak ittbayann ɣ willi ifttun ad ɛicn ɣ lxarij ?

en: How do you choose your friends?
sh: Manik ad tskart bac ad tstit imddukal nnk ?
